p: Ocimum basilicum oil comprises eugenol and methyl chavicol ( Figure 3A) as the main constituents [ 59]. Eugenol, beta-caryophyllene ( Figure 3B) and eugenyl acetate ( Figure 3C) are the chief active ingredients in Caryophylli flos, recognized as cloves [ 60]. It was found that eugenol activates TRPA1 [ 61, 62, 63] and TRPV1 [ 64, 65].
